genders.hidden: I don't want to talk about it!

not_author: These interactions are not for you! You're not the author of this message!

info: To change language, click the green button.
For more information about localizations, click the gray button.
change_language_guide: Select the language you want to use.
**Tip:** You can also execute this command to change language: ```{PREFIX}language <LANGUAGE>```
changed_successfully: Your language has been successfully changed to **{NEW_LANGUAGE}**!
language_not_found: Please check the spelling of the language you want to use. Otherwise do the following to see the full list of available languages: ```{PREFIX}language```

created_successfully: Your profile has been created successfully! (Saved in our data base)
To **config** your profile, do the following: ```{PREFIX}config <KEY> <VALUE>```
To **delete** your profile, do the following: ```{PREFIX}delete```
To **export** your/someone's profile, do the following: ```{PREFIX}export [USER]```
profile_already_existed: Your profile is already existed! You can't create more than 1 profile, our data storage are limited. :(

confirm_delete: Hey, are you sure you want to delete your profile?
deleted_successfully: The profile was deleted from database!
We're sorry to see you leave!
undid_successfully: We're glad to see you back!
profile_not_found: Your profile is not found! You can't delete a profile that doesn't exist. :(
Profile of **{USERNAME}** cannot be found! You can't display a profile that doesn't exist. :(

choose_action: *\*Do the command without any argument will display this guide.*
To **change** your profile information, do the following: ```{PREFIX}config <KEY> <VALUE>```
or instead of doing that way, you can click the **{CONFIG_BUTTON_LABEL}** button below and follow our tutorial.
For more information, click the **{TUTORIAL_BUTTON_LABEL}** button, I'll show you the full tutorial.

popup_window.title: Send us your feedback!
popup_window.incognito_send_input_placeholder: Yes/No or True/False, default is False...

command_feedback.button_feedback_label: I want to make a feedback!
feedback_guide: Type the feedback in the box, and we'll send it to our developers.
You can also write it in **English**, but it'll automatically translate it to **Vietnamese** for you.
feedback_sent: We're glad to hear from you! :D
